name: Turtesure Island
description:
You are the sole resident of Turtesure island. You have been living happily in the sea with your giant magical turtle. However, things are about to change. As you and your turtle are drifting at sea, you both accidently drift into a dangerous patch of water. Suddenly you are ambushed by bloodthirsty sharks. Armed with only your homemade coconut gun you must fend off enough sharks for you both to escape that patch of water!

Coding by Ethan Hopkins & Breena Hopkins

Sound by Wagner Serafim

Art by @OSIP
